alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:31PM MDT until May 29 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 231 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rapid Valley, or 4 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. Quarter sized hail is currently being observed in downtown Rapid City. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Caputa and Rapid City Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 58 and 74. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
